title: Style: Vans Vault Era 46 LX Nubuck
content:
Vans are always going to be cool, so cool in fact, that it would be pretty easy to churn out this classic design for the rest of time.

Thankfully, the popular skate brand isnâ€™t getting complacent. Their latest range of premium skate shoes come with a rather classy textile lining and a soft finish. The design is classic, clean and quintessentially Vans. Available from Hanon now.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
